title: fragment: CHH-2
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|bg-color=rgb(135, 107, 100)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-bg-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-3
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(212, 48, 15)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
I agree. That would be lovely.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/A.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I'm glad you agree. I've never been to this park, I just thought it would be a nice meeting place.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

The two of you begin to stroll through the park. Despite not being into nature, you have to admit that it's a pretty nice park.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I'm glad I chose this park. I like the duck pond. I've always loved animals.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Do you have any pets?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Ah, no. I don't really have time for pets. At my old job, I got to see some really cool animals, though. I've always wanted a really weird pet. Like a crab. This girl I knew at my old job had two pet crabs.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You found it interesting that that's what he decided to bring up about his old job.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
What was your old job?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-3
|unique-name=name-3
|display-name=Epon
]]
Ah, I worked at an exotic animal rescue.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

That was quite a stretch. This answer gave you a strange feeling, but you didn't know what it was.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Oh, that's cool.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Yeah. Maybe I can go back someday.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

His expression was complicated.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Why did you leave?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
There were... some administrative choices I disagreed with.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You two were silent for a moment.

He seems to miss working at the Foundation.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-2/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
So, what do you do for work?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/3 | Tell a half truth]]]

[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/capture-hi-s-heart-m/offset/4 | Turn the question back on him]]]
author: Mew-ltiverse
